DA: No probe into motive
in Beverly officer shooting

DA Jonathan Blodgett has essentially completed his investigation into the shooting of a Beverly police officer because the suspected shooter, Hamilton Police Sergeant Ken Nagy, committed suicide. (Globe, 8:43 a.m.)

Ohio school shooting suspect in custody

Officials have confirmed shootings at Chardon High School, 30 miles east of Cleveland, and that a suspect is now in custody. (AP, 9:19 a.m.)
